Flow.description: Single component per page testing harness P2. Radios, Select, Checkboxes, Date, File Upload.

value.stringValue:
Checkboxes1 test confirm

Selected value (label) = {!Checkboxes1.outputValue}, matches manually specified field label selected.

github #42 Safe Harbor: Selected value (Boolean) = {!Checkboxes1.outputValueBoolean} , matches manually specified value.

Selected value (label) = {!Checkboxes1.booleanValues}, matches selected option.

Select1 test details

Required = true

1. Test with no option selected - confirm on submit, that an error is displayed in the summary box and below the field header and that focus changes to error summary box. tab to error and confirm return or click on error messge moves focus to field in error.

2. Options specified manually in Flow

Select one or more values (n=make a note of selected values) and submit to confirm the selected values are displayed on the next screen
You must select one or more options

Selected value (label) = {!Checkboxes_values}, matches manually specified field label selected.

Selected value (Boolean) = {!Checkboxes_boolean} , matches manually specified value.

Selected value (collection) = {!Checkboxes_collection}, matches selected option.

NB outputs assigned to variables in Advanced - Assign Manual Variables

screens.description: use Advanced Manually Assign Variables to be able to display collection variable output in HTML in next screen element

Date1 test confirm

Date entered:

Date1 test details

Required = true >> Test with no values in Day, Month and Year. Also with incorrect values in day month year to confirm relevant error messages are displayed. selected. Error displayed in summary and by field. Focus to summary on Next. Focus from summary error message to field if selected.

CHANGE USER LANGUAGE. Repeast testing to confirm custom labels appear for selected language. Required = true >> Test with no values in Day, Month and Year. Also with incorrect values in day month year to confirm relevant error messages are displayed. selected. Error displayed in summary and by field. Focus to summary on Next. Focus from summary error message to field if selected.

Text fields test details

Text Input variables - multiple combinations tested.
You can be fined up to £5,000 if you do not register.

We need to know your nationality so we can work out which elections you’re entitled to vote in. If you cannot provide your nationality, you’ll have to send copies of identity documents through the post.
It can take up to 8 weeks to register a lasting power of attorney if there are no mistakes in the application.
Text input - simple with Large font (<h1> equivalent))
Text input, hint, Medium font (<h2> equivalent)
This has meaningless hint text associated
Text input, required, small font (<h3> equivalent)
You must enter a value (required small font)
You must enter a value in this text field (required)
Leave blank to test error handling
You must enter 10 characters or less
Text input with default value, fixed width of 10 and and character limit (required)
You are prevented from entering more than 10 characters
You must enter a valid email in the format x@y.z
Input text with email regex validation, fixed length 50
Enter a valid email format to comply with simple regex validation: ^\S+@\S+$
Input text with prefix and suffix
Future requirement - test reactive Flow function with LWC
Also one-half fixed width. Start typing your given name for browser to autocomplete.
You will receive an email confirmation shortly
